actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to specify the purposes for which funds provided under subpart 1 of part A of title I may be used.

summary.text: Title I Integrity Act of 2001 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (ESEA) to specify the purposes for which funds provided under subpart 1 (Basic Program Requirements) of part A (Improving Basic Programs Operated by Local Educational Agencies) of title I (Helping Disadvantaged Children Meet High Standards) (I-A funds) may be used.Requires local educational agencies to use I-A funds only to provide academic instruction and services directly related to the instruction of students in preschool through grade 12 to assist eligible children to improve their academic achievement and to meet achievement standards established by the State.Sets forth permissible and prohibited activities with respect to use of I-A funds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to specify the purposes for which funds provided under subpart 1 of part A of title I may be used.
